title: Woot's Spring sale includes some excellent discounts on refurbished MSI gaming PCs, GPUs, and more
description: I've always preferred building a machine piece by piece, but sometimes even I have to admit a good refurb sale is smarter. Woot's MSI event sale, alongside Woot's Spring gaming sale, feels like it was designed for anyone who wants real gaming hardware without paying real gaming hardware prices. Factory reconditioned means everything's tested, backed, and a lot cheaper than pretending brand new is always better. Read more
author: Christian Wait
excerpt: Woot is running an MSI refrubished sale that includes gaming PCs, RTX 4060Ti, PSUs, and Motherboards.
text: Refurbished components that are easy on your pocket. Image credit: RPS Photo Composite / MSI I've always preferred building a machine piece by piece, but sometimes even I have to admit a good refurb sale is smarter. Woot's MSI event sale, alongside Woot's Spring gaming sale, feels like it was designed for anyone who wants real gaming hardware without paying real gaming hardware prices. Factory reconditioned means everything's tested, backed, and a lot cheaper than pretending brand new is always better. If you're looking for parts that can actually last and not just fill up a shopping cart, this sale makes sense. A strong gaming desktop, a dependable graphics card, a future-ready motherboard, and a power supply that will not flinch when you upgrade again. Here are the four deals that stood out the most to me, but act fast, as each expires by the end of the day today, April 28. MSI Desktops MSI CODEX R2 C14NUD7-214US desktop is exactly what I would pick if I wanted to get gaming fast without the usual hassle. It has solid specs, a clean rebuild, and saves you the two-day headache of wiring everything up yourself. The centerpiece here is the included RTX 4060 Ti, which isn't that far behind the much more expensive RTX 5060Ti. Sometimes it is just easier to grab something built right and get back to playing instead of double-checking CPU cooler manuals. MSI AEGIS R 13NUE-448US Desktop: $1,129.99 MSI Creator P50 11TC-051US Desktop: $729.99 MSI CODEX ZS 5TC-042US (RTX 3060): $729.99 MSI CODEX R2 C14NUD7-214US Desktop: $999.99 MSI CODEX R2 A14NUD5-258US Desktop: $849.99 MSI AEGIS RS 12TJ-251US Desktop: $1,799.99 MSI AEGIS ZS 5TC-446US Desktop: $749.99 MSI Infinite RS 14NUG9-670US Desktop: $1,999.99 MSI AEGIS R2 A14NUF7-823US Desktop: $1,499.99 MSI AEGIS RS2 C14NUE7-827US Desktop: $1,499.99 MSI AEGIS RS2 C14NUF7-828US Desktop: $1,749.99 MSI VISION ELITE RS 14NUG9-831US Desktop: $2,899.99 MSI AEGIS R2 A14NUE9-1035US Desktop: $1,349.99 MSI Graphics Cards The MSI GeForce RTX 4060 Ti VENTUS 2X BLACK 16G OC is a smart pickup if you want real performance without setting your room on fire. It handles modern games at 1080p and 1440p without making you tweak settings for an hour. No overbuilt cooler, no pointless lights, just a card that does the job and keeps your upgrade simple. You're getting GDDR6 VRAM or a 5060Ti GDDR7, but the extra CUDA cores and clock speeds are minimal and hardly worth upgrading. MSI GeForce RTX 4060 Ti VENTUS 2X BLACK 16G OC: $419.99 MSI GeForce GT 1030 2GD4 LP OC: $57.99 MSI GeForce GT 1030 2GHD4 LP OC: $57.99 MSI Motherboards MSI MPG Z790 EDGE TI MAX WIFI motherboard is one of those upgrades you do not notice until you start plugging in latest gen hardware. It is packed with modern features like PCIe 5.0 and WiFi 7 without trying to be flashy about it. I've always trusted MSI boards to stay stable, and I know all of my PCI-E lanes will be functional. MSI MAG Z790 TOMAHAWK MAX WIFI Motherboard: $179.99 MSI MAG X870 TOMAHAWK WIFI Motherboard: $219.99 MSI X670E GAMING PLUS WIFI Motherboard: $189.99 MSI MPG X670E Carbon WiFi Gaming Motherboard: $289.99 MSI MEG X670E ACE Motherboard: $399.99 MSI MPG Z790 Carbon WiFi Gaming Motherboard: $249.99 MSI MPG Z790 EDGE TI MAX WIFI Motherboard: $229.99 MSI MAG Z890 TOMAHAWK WIFI Motherboard: $219.99 MSI MEG Z890 ACE Motherboard: $519.99 MSI MPG Z690 Carbon WiFi Gaming Motherboard: $139.99 MSI Power Supplies I think this PSU hit's the sweet spot. It's fully modular, meaning there's no need to stuff un-used sata and power cables in your case. 850w is more than enough to power the latest generation graphics cards and processors too. It's one component of a gaming PC that won't need replacing for a long time. MSI MAG A1250GL PCIE5 Power Supply: $159.99 MSI MAG A1000GL PCIE5 Power Supply: $129.99 MSI MAG A650BN Power Supply: $54.99 MSI MAG A850GL PCIE5 Power Supply: $89.99 MSI MAG A750GL PCIE5 Power Supply: $89.99 MSI MPG A1000G PCIE5 Power Supply: $129.99
html:
Refurbished components that are easy on your pocket.

I've always preferred building a machine piece by piece, but sometimes even I have to admit a good refurb sale is smarter. Woot's MSI event sale, alongside Woot's Spring gaming sale, feels like it was designed for anyone who wants real gaming hardware without paying real gaming hardware prices. Factory reconditioned means everything's tested, backed, and a lot cheaper than pretending brand new is always better.

If you're looking for parts that can actually last and not just fill up a shopping cart, this sale makes sense. A strong gaming desktop, a dependable graphics card, a future-ready motherboard, and a power supply that will not flinch when you upgrade again. Here are the four deals that stood out the most to me, but act fast, as each expires by the end of the day today, April 28.

MSI Desktops

MSI CODEX R2 C14NUD7-214US desktop is exactly what I would pick if I wanted to get gaming fast without the usual hassle. It has solid specs, a clean rebuild, and saves you the two-day headache of wiring everything up yourself. The centerpiece here is the included RTX 4060 Ti, which isn't that far behind the much more expensive RTX 5060Ti. Sometimes it is just easier to grab something built right and get back to playing instead of double-checking CPU cooler manuals.

  • MSI AEGIS R 13NUE-448US Desktop: $1,129.99
  • MSI Creator P50 11TC-051US Desktop: $729.99
  • MSI CODEX ZS 5TC-042US (RTX 3060): $729.99
  • MSI CODEX R2 C14NUD7-214US Desktop: $999.99
  • MSI CODEX R2 A14NUD5-258US Desktop: $849.99
  • MSI AEGIS RS 12TJ-251US Desktop: $1,799.99
  • MSI AEGIS ZS 5TC-446US Desktop: $749.99
  • MSI Infinite RS 14NUG9-670US Desktop: $1,999.99
  • MSI AEGIS R2 A14NUF7-823US Desktop: $1,499.99
  • MSI AEGIS RS2 C14NUE7-827US Desktop: $1,499.99
  • MSI AEGIS RS2 C14NUF7-828US Desktop: $1,749.99
  • MSI VISION ELITE RS 14NUG9-831US Desktop: $2,899.99
  • MSI AEGIS R2 A14NUE9-1035US Desktop: $1,349.99

MSI Graphics Cards

The MSI GeForce RTX 4060 Ti VENTUS 2X BLACK 16G OC is a smart pickup if you want real performance without setting your room on fire. It handles modern games at 1080p and 1440p without making you tweak settings for an hour. No overbuilt cooler, no pointless lights, just a card that does the job and keeps your upgrade simple. You're getting GDDR6 VRAM or a 5060Ti GDDR7, but the extra CUDA cores and clock speeds are minimal and hardly worth upgrading.

  • MSI GeForce RTX 4060 Ti VENTUS 2X BLACK 16G OC: $419.99
  • MSI GeForce GT 1030 2GD4 LP OC: $57.99
  • MSI GeForce GT 1030 2GHD4 LP OC: $57.99

MSI Motherboards

MSI MPG Z790 EDGE TI MAX WIFI motherboard is one of those upgrades you do not notice until you start plugging in latest gen hardware. It is packed with modern features like PCIe 5.0 and WiFi 7 without trying to be flashy about it. I've always trusted MSI boards to stay stable, and I know all of my PCI-E lanes will be functional.

  • MSI MAG Z790 TOMAHAWK MAX WIFI Motherboard: $179.99
  • MSI MAG X870 TOMAHAWK WIFI Motherboard: $219.99
  • MSI X670E GAMING PLUS WIFI Motherboard: $189.99
  • MSI MPG X670E Carbon WiFi Gaming Motherboard: $289.99
  • MSI MEG X670E ACE Motherboard: $399.99
  • MSI MPG Z790 Carbon WiFi Gaming Motherboard: $249.99
  • MSI MPG Z790 EDGE TI MAX WIFI Motherboard: $229.99
  • MSI MAG Z890 TOMAHAWK WIFI Motherboard: $219.99
  • MSI MEG Z890 ACE Motherboard: $519.99
  • MSI MPG Z690 Carbon WiFi Gaming Motherboard: $139.99

MSI Power Supplies

I think this PSU hit's the sweet spot. It's fully modular, meaning there's no need to stuff un-used sata and power cables in your case. 850w is more than enough to power the latest generation graphics cards and processors too. It's one component of a gaming PC that won't need replacing for a long time.

  • MSI MAG A1250GL PCIE5 Power Supply: $159.99
  • MSI MAG A1000GL PCIE5 Power Supply: $129.99
  • MSI MAG A650BN Power Supply: $54.99
  • MSI MAG A850GL PCIE5 Power Supply: $89.99
  • MSI MAG A750GL PCIE5 Power Supply: $89.99
  • MSI MPG A1000G PCIE5 Power Supply: $129.99
